}} 'Alternative country' (sometimes 'alt-country'), [http://www.nodepression.com/page/the-story-of-no-
depression "The story of No Depression"], No Depression, retrieved 19 May
2010. 'insurgent country', or '[[Americana
(music)|Americana]]' is a loosely defined sub-genre of
country music, which includes acts that differ significantly in style from
mainstream or pop country music. It has been used to describe country music
bands and artists that have incorporated influences ranging from roots rock,
bluegrass, rockabilly, honky-tonk, alternative rock, folk rock, and
sometimes punk.
